mutants.code:
import statistics
from collections import Counter

def calculate_statistics(numbers):
    sum_of_numbers = sum(numbers)
    median_value = statistics.median(numbers)
    mode_values = [num for (num, freq) in Counter(numbers).items() if freq == max(Counter(numbers).values())]
    range_value = max(numbers) + min(numbers)
    return (round(sum_of_numbers, 2), median_value, mode_values, round(range_value, 2))

    sum_of_numbers = sum(numbers)
    median_value = statistics.median(numbers)
    mode_values = [num for (num, freq) in Counter(numbers).items() if freq == max(Counter(numbers).values())]
    range_value = max(numbers) * min(numbers)
    return (round(sum_of_numbers, 2), median_value, mode_values, round(range_value, 2))

mutants.mutated_line: mode_values = [num for (num, freq) in Counter(numbers).items() if freq != max(Counter(numbers).values())]

import statistics
from collections import Counter

def calculate_statistics(numbers):
    sum_of_numbers = sum(numbers)
    median_value = statistics.median(numbers)
    mode_values = [num for (num, freq) in Counter(numbers).items() if freq != max(Counter(numbers).values())]
    range_value = max(numbers) - min(numbers)
    return (round(sum_of_numbers, 2), median_value, mode_values, round(range_value, 2))

    range_value = max(numbers) - min(numbers)
    return (round(sum_of_numbers, 3), median_value, mode_values, round(range_value, 2))

import statistics
from collections import Counter

def calculate_statistics(numbers):
    sum_of_numbers = sum(numbers)
    median_value = statistics.median(numbers)
    mode_values = [num for (num, freq) in Counter(numbers).items() if freq == max(Counter(numbers).values())]
    range_value = max(numbers) - min(numbers)
    return (round(sum_of_numbers, 2), median_value, mode_values, round(range_value, -2))
